title: Hellsing: Digest for Freaks
original_name: HELLSING I OVA DIGEST FOR FREAKS
ending_song: "Gradus Vita" by Hayato Matsuo, performed by the Warsaw Philharmonic Orchestra
sinopse: This OVA is a summary of the first three episodes of Hellsing, with the animation style of Hellsing Ultimate and following the events of the Hellsing manga.
